mapper.insert: INSERT INTO agent( agent_name, agent_phone, agent_email, username, password, cid_type, cid_num, cid_picture, create_date ) VALUES ( #{agentName}, #{agentPhone}, #{agentEmail}, #{username}, #{password}, #{cidType}, #{cidNum}, #{cidPicture}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE agent SET is_locked = #{isLocked}, last_lock_date = NOW() WHERE agent_id = #{agentId}
mapper.select: SELECT agent_id, agent_name, agent_phone, agent_email, username, password, cid_type, cid_num, cid_picture, create_date, is_locked, last_login_date, login_times, last_login_date, last_login_ip FROM agent WHERE agent_id = #{_parameter} AND is_active = 1
SELECT agent_id, password, is_locked FROM agent WHERE (username = #{_parameter} OR agent_phone = #{_parameter} OR agent_email = #{_parameter}) AND is_active = 1

SELECT agent_id, agent_name, agent_phone, agent_email, username, password, cid_type, cid_num, cid_picture, create_date, is_locked, last_login_date, login_times, last_login_date, last_login_ip FROM agent WHERE is_active = 1
